channel.title: Personal Ai on this is a website for thinking
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Ai on this is a website for thinking

item.title: Benchmarking Graph Embeddings on Small Data
item.description: When I read papers on embeddings, I see vectors trained on a massive scale, with huge data. Text from The Pile, web crawl data from Common Crawl, articles from Wikipedia, data on a scale that could not possibly be replicated by a single human person. The language models that result from these efforts are a triumph of engineering, and lay the foundation for something that I am passionate about: Models on a human scale.
